data.title: The Godzilla Podcast: Godzilla (1998)
data.meta_description: The #Godzilla Podcast has returned with a commentary of the controversial 1998 American Kaiju film, Godzilla!  Directed by Roland Emmerich Produced by Dean Devlin Screenplay by Dean Devlin, Roland Emmerich Story by Ted Elliott, Terry Rossio, Dean Devlin, Roland Emmerich Based on "Godzilla" by Toho Starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo, Hank Azaria, Kevin Dunn, Michael Lerner, Harry Shearer Music by David Arnold Cinematography Ueli Steiger Edited by Peter Amundson, David J. Siegel Release date May 20, 1998 (United States) Running time 139 minutes Budget $130–150 million Box office $379 million
data.text:
Info

The Godzilla Podcast

One by one Drew and Joe are gonna go through the Godzilla Movies and talk about them. The King of the Monsters is back!

RSS Feed

The #Godzilla Podcast has returned with a commentary of the controversial 1998 American Kaiju film, Godzilla!

Directed by Roland Emmerich

Produced by Dean Devlin

Screenplay by Dean Devlin, Roland Emmerich

Story by Ted Elliott, Terry Rossio, Dean Devlin, Roland Emmerich

Based on "Godzilla" by Toho

Starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo, Hank Azaria, Kevin Dunn, Michael Lerner, Harry Shearer

Music by David Arnold

Cinematography Ueli Steiger

Edited by Peter Amundson, David J. Siegel

Release date May 20, 1998 (United States)

Running time 139 minutes

Budget $130–150 million

Box office $379 million
